description: The action to delete the replicated bot in the secondary region.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the replicated bot to be deleted from the secondary region.

parameters.name: replicaRegion
parameters.description: The secondary region of the replicated bot that will be deleted.
